name: Dice Facets
description:
You can download a mobile version on GooglePlay Store.

If you can upvote my game on ProductHunt, it would be great! Thanks!
https://www.producthunt.com/posts/dice-facets

Update 1.1:

Updated New Control Keys.

Control your Dice and Move it to the same Facets within Limited Moves. Finish all the Facets and You Win!

More Than 100 Levels

Control:

- A(Top Left)/X(Bottom Right)/L(Top Right)/M(Bottom Left) (Move The Cube)

- A/D (In Menu: Choose Levels)

- Q (Switch View Angle)

- W (Undo Move)

- E (Reset All Move to Start Position)

- Esc (Menu) Enter (Confirm)
